name: VEROCY
goal:
Verocy is a boutique consultancy that provides risk integrated strategy services and solutions for companies and organizations that need to develop and manage the value of assets and resources in the MENA-region.

Integrated risk consultancy, focusing on critical infrastructure and resources, geopolitical risks, insight and analysis, incidents tracking & asset value management solutions.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Energy Union, EU Foreign Policy, EU Security, EU External Action, oil-gas-energy, terrorism/counter-terrorism, GCC-EU, Sovereign Wealth
